rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: You're in the most beautiful kitchen you have ever seen.

usefulItem.name: match
dialogs: On the floor there is a single [match].
You use the match to light the stove!
Seems like the pilot light is out.

actor.name: duckling
dialogs: In the middle of the room, is a [Duckling] playing with a yellow rubber duck in a big fish tank
I heard [Fish] wants his bowl back! Make sure to tell them I said thank you for letting me borrow it!
Thank you
Quack Quack

trivia.question: An adult male duck is referred to as a _____?
Many birds have a gland that produces a waxy oil to waterproof feathers called a _____ gland?
How long after hatching are Ducklings able to walk and leave the nest?
a group of ducks can be called a ______?
How many eyelids does a duck have?

rooms.name: stock room
rooms.description: You're in a small cramped [STOCK ROOM]

actor.name: duck
dialogs: A french [Duck] is preparing a meal. They look very busy
Don't Bother Me! I am busy preparing a meal. If you can, fix the stove that would help me out.
Thank you for fixing the stove! I'm bad with numbers and can only remember the last number was 2, Sorry. Here's a reward for your trouble.
Quack Quack

trivia.question: An adult male duck is referred to as a _____?
Many birds have a gland that produces a waxy oil to waterproof feathers called a _____ gland?
How long after hatching are Ducklings able to walk and leave the nest?
a group of ducks can be called a ______?
How many eyelids does a duck have?

actor.name: dog
dialogs: A [Dog] is sitting in the captains chair. They look very busy
Help my crew and I might think about not kicking you off the ship stranger
Thank you for helping my crew. The code to the [keypad] is 4982!
Woof!

trivia.question: An upright and still tail indicates that a dog is _______?
Greyhounds can run up to ___ miles per hour.?
The first dog superstar was ________?
A Russian dog named ______ was the first animal in space and traveled around the Earth in 1957?
Dalmatian puppies are born with ____?

rooms.name: engine room
rooms.description: You're in a small cramped [ENGINE ROOM]

actor.name: horse
dialogs: A large [Horse] is pacing back and forth
I need to find my wrench, the captain told me you came to help. Can you help me find my wrench
Thank you for finding my wrench, now i can fix the escape pod engine. The first number to the code is 4
Ney!

trivia.question: Horses are measured in ____?
Horses came from what continent?
A baby horse is called a _____?
The original horse was no larger than a ____?
Horses ______ burp?

usefulItem.name: match
dialogs: On the floor there is a single [match].
You use the match to light the stove!
Seems like the pilot light is out.

rooms.name: escape hatch
rooms.description: You're in a small cramped [ESCAPE HATCH]

actor.name: fish
dialogs: A [Fish] is repairing some air lock doors. They look very busy
That [Cat] keeps trying to swipe at me! I need my [fishbowl] to protect me. Can you go talk to the [Duckling] who is using my [fishbowl] as a swimming pool?
No way! I got my fishbowl back. Thank you so much stranger! The third number to the [POD] [keypad] is 8!
Glub glub

trivia.question: What is the loudest fish?
A Lungfish can live out of water for _______?
Oldest known fish was ___ years old Lungfish?
Only fish that has eye lids is the __________ ?
The slowest fish is a ________?

usefulItem.name: wrench
dialogs: A [wrench] sits on the table. Should you take it?
You use the WRENCH to dig through the tunnel
If only you had some type of digging tool

usefulItem.name: keypad
dialogs: A [keypad] is attached to the display of the pod to activate it.
something
A [keypad] is attached to the display of the pod to activate it.

actor.name: cat
dialogs: A [Cat] is lounging on a high perch.
I love messing with [Fish], but I want more exciting toys! Can you Steal the laser pointer from Dog. He keeps it in the [DORMS]
Thank you for the toy! I heard you wanted to use the [POD], I remember the second number was the number of lives a [Cat] has.
Meow

trivia.question: Cats move with their right feet and then their left feet. The only other animals that walk this way are ________?
Cats have whiskers on the back of their ______, as well?
A cat with a question-mark-shaped tail is asking, “________”?
answers: Want to get something to eat

trivia.question: Meowing is a behavior that cats developed exclusively to ___________?
A ______ cat was born in Denmark in 1995. Some people believe that high levels of copper in the water pipes nearby may have given his fur a verdigris effect?

fighters.name: Kakashi
fighters.intro: Looks like Kakashi is preparing to use his Chidori attack
fighters.question:
How would you like to attack? 
 1: Use a Genjutsu attack 
 2: Ninjutsu attack 
 3: Dodge

attacks.name: Genjutsu Attack
attacks.text:
You used your genjutsu and was able to defeat the opponent!! 
Wow that was fast!! ....and the winner is YOU!!

attacks.name: Ninjutsu Attack
attacks.text:
Kakashi: He thinks he got me with that move lol...
Your opponent has defeated you before you could blink!!!
Better luck next time!!!

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.text:
Kakashi: Haaa I'll see about that!
You dodged the attack but it was a distraction and your opponent defeated you with a blazing kick to the back of your head!
Call the medics this match is over!!

fighters.name: Gaara
fighters.intro: Gaara throws a sand bullet fast!!
fighters.question:
How would you like to attack? 
 1: Use a Genjutsu attack 
 2: Ninjutsu attack 
 3: Dodge

attacks.name: Genjutsu Attack
attacks.text:
You attempted to prepare a genjutsu attack but Gaara's sand bullet got to you too fast
Wow it tore through your chest!
The winner is Gaara!!!

attacks.name: Ninjutsu Attack
attacks.text:
You attacked Gaara with your flying leg attack while dodging his sand bullet!
Gaara is out cold from that attack, you have won the match!!

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.text:
Gaara: Whaaaaat!!!! How are you moving so fast!!!!!!
Great you dodged it!, then you used your speedy Ninjutsu attacks to defeat Garaa!!
You Won Congrats!!!

fighters.name: Killer B
fighters.intro: Killer B starts rapping after the battle starts
fighters.question:
How would you like to attack? 
 1: Use a Genjutsu attack 
 2: Ninjutsu attack 
 3: Join in and rap also

attacks.name: Genjutsu Attack
attacks.text:
You used your genjutsu and was able to defeat the opponent!!\nKiller B Genjutsu is too advanced! He broke out of your visual prowess and used his lightning sword attack to defeat you! all while he was rapping!
You lose!!

attacks.name: Ninjutsu Attack
attacks.text:
Killer B: Yo you trynna disrespect me while I'm spittin my raps!! Take This!!!!
he uses his 8 tails ability to defeat you quickly!!!
You have a lost this match, try again next year!!

attacks.name: Dodge
attacks.text:
You joined Killer B and spit some of your own bars!
Killer B: Yoooo I like this kid those raps were all that!!!

Killer B: yo I can't compete with that I gotta go think of some more raps!
B forfeits the match and you are the winner!!!

villages.name: The Hidden Leaf Village
villages.intro: Looks like you will be facing the Legendary Kakashi

villages.name: The Village Hidden in the Stones
The Village Hidden in the Clouds
villages.intro: You will be matched against Killer B
